Text.Page:
Our progress is impeded by {@LinkCreature:27#3#ancient speargolems}, who block the route to Liberation Station.

I need you to clear a path through those pests so our supply couriers make their rounds. Armies not only travel on their stomachs, they usually live or die by them. Let's not be defeated for lack of basic foodstuffs.

Your handling of this situation was efficient. I approve.

I'll alert the quartermaster to dispatch the next group of runners.
